content: Jiao-Loong of Waves is one of the optional Yaoguai Chiefs you can fight in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). This water-based dragon is a fan of quick moves and tail whips to try and catch you off guard.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Jiao-Loong_of_Waves.md', within the main section titled 'Jiao-Loong of Waves'.
The content is as follows:
Jiao-Loong of Waves is one of the optional Yaoguai Chiefs you can fight in Chapter 6 of Black Myth: Wukong"). This water-based dragon is a fan of quick moves and tail whips to try and catch you off guard.
